feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: W 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
